# CFURLPathStyle.cfurlWindowsPathStyle

**Case**

Indicates a Windows style path name.

## Declaration

```swift
case cfurlWindowsPathStyle
```

## Constants

- **CFURLPathStyle.cfurlposixPathStyle**: Indicates a POSIX style path name. Components are slash delimited. A leading slash indicates an absolute path; a trailing slash is not significant.
- **CFURLPathStyle.cfurlhfsPathStyle**: Indicates a HFS style path name. Components are colon delimited. A leading colon indicates a relative path, otherwise the first path component denotes the volume.
